mapper.select: SELECT A.*,B.USER_NAME FROM ( SELECT FAQ_ID ,DATE_FORMAT(FAQ_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS FAQ_DT ,USER_ID ,FAQ_TYPE ,CASE WHEN FAQ_TYPE=0 THEN '운영 FAQ' ELSE '운영 FAQ' END AS FAQ_TYPE_NM ,FAQ_TITLE ,CONTENT FROM FAQ_INFO WHERE FAQ_ID=#{FAQ_ID} )A LEFT JOIN USER_INFO B ON(A.USER_ID=B.USER_ID)
